are those subs embedded because i can't get rid of them by disabling them in the .mkv player

i can understand english in english, who would add english subs to an english show.

They are not embedded and can be disabled.

Subtitles are useful if you are not fluent in English. Or if you are just plain fucking deaf.

Did anyone else hear high-pitched squeaky noises intermittently throughout the episodes? I've watched about half a dozen and they all have this same problem. I'm using VLC player. Please advise. Thanks!
